name: strapi-next-launchpad-example
description: Next.js Launchpad Example powered by Strapi

scripts.setup: yarn install && yarn setup:next && yarn setup:strapi
scripts.dev: yarn concurrently "cd strapi && yarn develop" "npx wait-on http://localhost:1337 && cd next && yarn dev"
scripts.repo:upstream: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
